hero.title: Hi, I'm Dmitro
hero.subtitle: I develope web apps, blogs or interactive landing pages

about.subtitle: Introduction
about.title: Overview.
about.description: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js. I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

myWorks.title: Projects.
myWorks.subtitle: My work
myWorks.description: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

card1.title: Online library
card1.description: Small online library with auth, custom comments system, content system and responsive design.

card2.title: Movie Search App
card2.description: A test project that I've done withing 2 days. App have functions such as searching movies, added movie to favourites list, view details of the movie.
